duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage projects and develop quality project-related documentation.
Collaborate with stakeholders to document project scope, goals, and resources.
Lead and facilitate the completion of project phases deliverables.
Manage deadlines and push the team to ensure timelines are met.
Ensure proper level of communication and coordination with vendors and suppliers.
Identify and manage areas of risk in documentation and contract documents.
Measure and report project performance and milestones to stakeholders and senior management.
Provide leadership and motivation to establish a team culture that promotes creativity.
Ensure compliance with policies and procedures for effective change management strategy.
Participate in other projects and endeavors as assigned/needed.
May travel up to 5% of the year.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in project management, business, management, information systems, or related field (Master’s/Advanced Degree preferred)
